title: 'Pay' for an endorsement? L.A.'s Democratic clubs under scrutiny this election
dc:creator: Dakota Smith, Summer Lin
description: L.A. Democratic clubs are in the spotlight after two high-profile instances in which there was talk of buying clubs and paying for endorsements.
content:encoded: L.A. Democratic clubs are in the spotlight after two high-profile instances in which there was talk of buying clubs and paying for endorsements.

media:content.media:description: Ron Herrera, president of the Los Angeles County Federation of Labor, delivers a speech during a rally for Gov. Gavin Newsom in El Sereno, on July 13, 2021. Photo by Pablo Unzueta for CalMatters
